Reviews.Title: The device is ok, but very very slow
Reviews.Author: HDAVIS
Reviews.Content: I really do not recommend this device it takes too much time to move from one menu to another, check other options with better processor

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: Edwin
Reviews.Content: Good product, practicle and cheap.Easy to use for basic needs, tutorial self explainable, quick access, clean interface and variety of apps available.

Reviews.Title: features
Reviews.Author: Gaby Herrera
Reviews.Content: i dont know if i knoe how does it work but it wont receive calls in the 2 simcardsyou have to choose which one will receive so even if you have the 2 simcards you can only use once..like it will be nice if you have a phone call in one , know that you receved a maessage or a phone call in the other one...

Reviews.Title: Great dual sim phone
Reviews.Author: JK
Reviews.Content: Great phone. At first, installing some apps was somewhat confusing, but then it was straightforward. Not sure why, but the phone shut down unexpectedly few times at first. It has not happened again. I use it whenever I am overseas and need more than one sim. I strongly recommend as a dual sim phone. It is light and rather practical to carry.

Reviews.Title: A good phone
Reviews.Author: Green Lantern "Glantern"
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice small phone, with similar functions to iPhone. It allows to download apps, send text messages, take pictures, make movies. It also has many optional languages.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Randy Doll
Reviews.Content: Great phone. I have had it for several weeks now and so far, no problems. Easy to use and navigate through the menu.

Reviews.Title: Excelenet suplier!!!
Reviews.Author: Bernardo
Reviews.Content: The product arrive on time, satisfactoy!, thanks a million!!!!...........

Reviews.Title: Good Cellphone
Reviews.Author: ricardo8805
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my father,he loved it.. im gonna buy one of this for my mom and me

Reviews.Title: Buena compra.
Reviews.Author: Karin
Reviews.Content: El celular es tal cual se describe, funciona bien y sin problemas acá en Venezuela con Digitel, Movilnet y Movistar. Recomendado!

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Ace Duos S6802 WIFI, 5MP, 3G, Gingerbread, Dual-Sim Factory Unlocked World Mobile Phone - Black
